Class Request

java.lang.Object
  io.spire.request.Request

Direct Known Subclasses:
GCRequest
public abstract class Request
extends Object
implements Requester

Spire HTTP Request Abstract class Encapsulates any underlying HTTP client library used

Since:
1.0

setConnectionTimeout

public abstract void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Description copied from interface: Requester
Sets the timeout in milliseconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout. By default it is 20000 (20 seconds)
